Plot
The world has been reshaped by the invasion of 
ghosts via the wireless internet. Cities are 
deserted, technology has been destroyed and the 
few remaining human beings eschew anything 
electrical in order to avoid a confrontation 
with the soulless ghosts that now wander the 
planet. Most of the ghosts are doomed to a 
repetitive loop of something they did while they 
were still despairing humans (a man repeatedly 
hangs himself, for example), but there are some 
ghosts so locked in denial, they do not know they 
are dead. They continue to haunt their homes, 
wrapped in fear that their souls will 
soon be torn from them.
